market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Language Pack Installer as an administrator from the Tools menu. The installer will then copy the language packs over your installation, requiring a server restart in the end. You might also need to clear the browser's cache.

Please note that if you upgrade one of the translated plugins, you will need to run the Language Pack Installer again.
